item.title: Building a Twitter clone app in htmx
item.description: In this post, we are going to build a Twitter clone demo application using htmx. Before diving into the tutorial, let me tell you the background story about why I decided to build this app using htmx. It all started with this blog post on A List Apart by Matt E. Patterson called The Future of Web Software Is HTML-over-WebSockets. In this article Matt talks about the advantages of sending HTML over the wire via AJAX requests or Web Sockets and the performance benefits they offer and he mentions tools and libraries like Hotwire, StimulusReflex and so on.
